# conceptnet-client

![Python Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.7%2B-blue)
![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/aalireza83/conceptnet-client)
![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-0.1.0-green)

A Pythonic and object-oriented wrapper for the [ConceptNet API](https://conceptnet.io), designed to make working with knowledge graphs and semantic networks simple and intuitive.

## âœ¨ Features

- Lightweight and dependency-minimal (only `requests`)
- Object-oriented interface to nodes, edges, and relations
- Easy querying of ConceptNet with automatic URL construction
- Handles API responses
- Python 3.7+ compatible
